title: How 18 Minutes Changed History: Texas, Mexico, and the U.S. Takeover
description:
Texas, once part of Mexico, became a hotspot of conflict over land, slavery, and migration.
Anglo-American settlers rebelled, leading to the Texas Revolution of 1835.
The Battle of San Jacinto, lasting just 18 minutes, secured Texan independence.
In 1845, Texas was annexed by the U.S., straining ties with Mexico.
